useEffect(()=>{fetch("/ask",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({is_first:true})}).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setMessages([{sender:"bot",text:data.answer}]);});},[]);// message to send question to API
const sendMessage=async()=>{const question=input.trim();if(!question)return;// Add user message
